name: Bolds Creative
tagline: Being just bold wasn’t enough. So we added an S.
description:
Since 2010, New York City based Bolds Creative has been providing impactful design solutions and support to big and small clients alike. Led by principal and founder Roni Meital, each member of the Bolds Creative team breaks the boundaries of traditionally defined roles such as “packaging designer” or “copywriter” and are instead a group of talented multi-disciplinary experts.
 
At Bolds Creative inspired design and flawless execution go hand in hand.
